Investment Scholars Club presents the latest news from the financial center.

Research Alert - Undervalued
August 26, 2002
XrayMedia
(OTCBB: XRMD) Alert Rating = 8

Hats off to our subscribers who acted promptly on our previous report!

Choice #1 - CMGI, a significant internet incubator, has shown remarkable growth, up by over 150% with notable volume and positive news.

Choice #2 - ENBC has experienced a significant increase, reaching a high of over 300% after an initial climb of 200%.

Our Latest Find: XRMD - XrayMedia has been featured in various investment reports during the fiscal year 2001/02. The company has shown promise in the advertising industry due to its innovative direct sourcing technology solutions. With a modest $2 million raised over two years, XrayMedia has expanded revenue sources by introducing a financial services division. This expansion is expected to boost revenues to $3-5 million in fiscal 2003 and to $15-25 million in 2004. The company's unique direct sourcing model offers advertisers and retailers cost savings of up to 70% by streamlining processes, reducing costs, and providing free mass sourcing opportunities through secure real-time negotiation technology on the web.

How does XrayMedia achieve this?

XrayMedia (OTCBB: XRMD) was established in March 2000 to develop a live negotiating technology for the advertising sector. With proprietary software, it offers a sophisticated platform that accelerates orders and identifies opportunities based on user criteria, benefiting both advertisers and ad sellers.

Their 'source to business model' eliminates sourcing barriers, providing customers with a wide range of advertising options and live negotiation at a low cost, resulting in significant savings.

Unlike many loss-making tech companies, XrayMedia's projection of revenue growth from $1 to $25 million in three years with minimal funding is impressive. Positioned as one of the top-performing sectors post-September 11th, XrayMedia is poised to surpass its 52-week high of $0.19 soon.

Key Points About XrayMedia:
- Listed on the OTCBB with a market valuation under 10 million.
- Established partnerships with major media buyers, retailers, and smaller businesses.
- Attracting interest from prominent investment analysts and bankers, with potential as an acquisition target by major retailers.
- Secured significant advertising financing contracts with revenues expected to grow from $1 million to $5 million.
- Anticipated profitability and substantial revenue and earnings growth at the start of the 2003 fiscal year in January.

The proposition is as follows: We have a situation involving a deceased foreign customer, specifically a Turkish national who was a contractor with a government agency. In our branch, he left behind a significant sum of US$35 million, and no next of kin has come forward to claim the funds since his passing four years ago.

Together with two other senior bank officials, we have kept this account undisclosed until now. We are looking for a foreign partner, like yourself, to pose as one of his next of kin and provide us with your account details and other necessary documents that we will guide you on. We will utilize our positions to facilitate the retrieval of the funds within ten working days.

If you are interested, please let me know, and I will provide you with all the details needed to proceed with the arrangement.

All communication regarding this matter will be conducted via email.

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,

MR MABO LOKO
